name: Paris
description: Experience the city of lights and love with iconic landmarks.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Paris and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit the Eiffel Tower and Seine River cruise.
Day 3: Explore the Louvre Museum and Montmartre.

name: New York
description: Explore the vibrant streets and cultural landmarks of NYC.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in New York and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.
Day 3: Explore Central Park and Times Square.
Day 4: Attend a Broadway show and visit the Museum of Modern Art.
Day 5: Departure.

name: Tokyo
description: Dive into the bustling metropolis with a blend of tradition and modernity.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Tokyo and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Explore Shibuya Crossing and Shinjuku.
Day 3: Visit Senso-ji Temple and Asakusa.
Day 4: Discover Akihabara and Tokyo Tower.
Day 5: Day trip to Mount Fuji.
Day 6: Explore Odaiba and Tokyo Skytree.
Day 7: Departure.

name: Barcelona
description: Discover the unique architecture and vibrant culture of Barcelona.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Barcelona and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit Sagrada Família and Park Güell.
Day 3: Explore La Rambla and the Gothic Quarter.
Day 4: Departure.

name: Rome
description: Step back in time and explore the ancient wonders of Rome.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Rome and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit the Colosseum and Roman Forum.
Day 3: Explore Vatican City and St. Peter’s Basilica.
Day 4: Visit the Pantheon and Piazza Navona.
Day 5: Departure.

name: Sydney
description: Enjoy the stunning harbor views and relaxed lifestyle of Sydney.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Sydney and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.
Day 3: Explore Bondi Beach and its surroundings.
Day 4: Discover the Royal Botanic Garden and Darling Harbour.
Day 5: Day trip to Blue Mountains.
Day 6: Departure.

name: Dubai
description: Experience the luxurious and futuristic cityscape of Dubai.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Dubai and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall.
Day 3: Explore Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina.
Day 4: Departure.

name: Istanbul
description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of Istanbul.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Istanbul and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit Hagia Sophia and Topkapi Palace.
Day 3: Explore the Grand Bazaar and Blue Mosque.
Day 4: Take a Bosphorus Cruise.
Day 5: Departure.

name: Cape Town
description: Explore the beautiful landscapes and diverse culture of Cape Town.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Cape Town and check-in at the hotel.
Day 2: Visit Table Mountain and explore the Waterfront.
Day 3: Take a trip to Cape of Good Hope.
Day 4: Visit Kirstenbosch Gardens and enjoy a local tour.
Day 5: Free day for shopping or additional activities.
Day 6: Departure.
